name: BOX (ElzaiGames)
description:
Think inside the box...

BOX is a logic puzzle-platformer where you must navigate small mazes and symmetrical obstacles to collect every object. Rotate the stage itself to change the layout of the maze, as well as your own position, to reach impossible places.

47 puzzles. VHS aesthetic. Soft electronic music. Boxes.

A chair. A screen. And you.
